sentence.Network_en: He has not wherewith to pay his debts.
He thus typified the constant introspection wherewith he tortured, but could not purify himself.
sentence.Network_cn: 他就这样不断地自省,其实只是在自我折磨, 丝毫得不到自我净化.

sentence.Network_en: Knowledge is the wing wherewith we fly to heaven.
sentence.Network_cn: 知识是我们飞向天堂的翅膀.

PerfectNetExp.abs: 以w开头的英语英文单词 ... wherever 无论在(到)哪里 wherewith 用什么,用那个,藉其 wherewithal 钱财.
新浪新浪网 - Dictionary ... whereupon 于是;因此 wherewith 用什麽,用那个,藉其 wherewithal 钱财.
以w开头的英语英文单词 ... wherever 无论在(到)哪里 wherewith 用什么,用那个,藉其 wherewithal 钱财.
希伯来书 Hebrews 10... ... oftentimes 屡次，常常六级词汇 wherewith 用什么；用以六级词汇 recompense 回报；补偿四级词汇.

list.abs: I haven ' t wherewithal to marry ., 我没钱结婚.
we have the ability , wherewithal and experience toand experience to ensure your full satisfaction .我们有这样的能力和经验确保您达到此目标。

no individual or subgroup in a market has the financial wherewithal to sway prices in the way the marginal-trader hypothesis suggests an opinion that is echoed by some economists .他就认为边际交易者只是一则神话，市场中并没有任何个人或小团体拥有足够的金融资金，可像边际交易者假说中所主张的方式那样左右价格。这个意见获得某些经济学家
Few brokerages have the skills or financial wherewithal to underwrite a public equity offering ., 几乎没有哪家券商有技能或财力来承销股票公开发行.
He didn ' t have the wherewithal to repay the loan ., 他没有钱偿还贷款.

means.word_mean: 1. out of, or by means of which;

sentences.sentence: "tools wherewith to scrape the windshield of my car"
